alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 4:13AM MST until December 25 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Snow will continue to taper off this morning, before returning this afternoon and transitioning to a wintry mix. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Flathead Lake, Flathead Valley, Mission Valley, and Polson. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
